service.title: Trace Context
service.documentation: This specification defines standard HTTP headers and a value format to propagate context information that enables distributed tracing scenarios. The specification standardizes how context information is sent and modified between services. Context information uniquely identifies individual requests in a distributed system and also defines a means to add and propagate provider-specific context information.

http-header.documentation: The traceparent header represents the incoming request in a tracing system in a common format.
The tracestate HTTP header field conveys information about request position in multiple distributed tracing graphs.
